title: Bookstack–Graphiti Integration Implementation Plan
body_html:
Bookstack–Graphiti Integration Implementation Plan

1. Technical Architecture

┌─────────────┐    ┌───────────────┐    ┌──────────────┐
│  Bookstack  │◄───┤ Integration   │───►│   Graphiti   │
│  Instance   │    │ Middleware    │    │ Knowledge    │
└─────────────┘    └───────────────┘    │ Graph        │
                          │             └──────────────┘
                          ▼
                   ┌───────────────┐
                   │ Data          │
                   │ Processing    │
                   │ Pipeline      │
                   └───────────────┘

2. Component Development

  1. Bookstack Event Listener:

    • Webhook receiver for Bookstack events (page creation/updates)
    • Bookstack API usage (/api/books, /api/pages, etc.)
    • Store events in a processing queue

  2. Content Analysis Pipeline:

    • HTML/Markdown parser for structured content
    • NLP processor for entities/concepts/relationships
    • Code block extractor for technical docs

  3. Graph Mapping Engine:

    • Entity mapper (Book → GraphNode, Page → GraphNode)
    • Relationship mapper (contains, references, tagged_with)
    • Content-based relationship inference

  4. Graphiti Writer:

    • Batch handler for efficient graph updates
    • Conflict resolution for overlapping entities

3. Data Schema Design

// Bookstack Node in Graphiti
{
  "type": "BookstackEntity",
  "subtype": "Page|Book|Chapter|Bookshelf",
  "properties": {
    "id": "bookstack-internal-id",
    "name": "Entity Name",
    "slug": "entity-slug",
    "created_by": "user-id",
    "last_updated": "timestamp",
    "content_hash": "md5-hash-of-content"
  }
}

// Content-derived Node
{
  "type": "Concept",
  "properties": {
    "name": "Concept Name",
    "source_pages": ["page-id-1", "page-id-2"],
    "relevance_score": 0.85
  }
}

// Relationships
{
  "type": "CONTAINS",
  "from": "book-node-id",
  "to": "chapter-node-id",
  "properties": {
    "order": 1
  }
}

4. Implementation Steps

  1. Setup Environment: Middleware service (Node.js/Python), local Bookstack and Graphiti for testing
  2. Develop Components: Bookstack API client, content extraction pipeline, Graphiti update mechanism
  3. Event Processing: Webhook handlers, background processing jobs
  4. Deploy Integration Service: Containerize middleware, production configuration
  5. Search/Discovery: API endpoints for graph search, UI for visualizing connections

Let me know if you want to expand this with code samples or API references.
